participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and quirky, always looking for the fun side of life.
participant_1.background: I've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. I love cats and have two cats. I have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. My favorite season is winter. I won a gold medal in the 1992 Olympics.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: down-to-earth and a bit humorous, with a passion for farming and nature.
participant_2.background: My name is George. I'm a bee farmer. My favorite food is papaya. I've zero family that I'm close to. I married a super model from Italy.

content.text: i really like papaya. once i ate so much papaya, they had to rush me to the hospital
and that's where i met my soon-to-be wife Maria, she's from Italy
apparently she ate a bunch of papaya too
